mapper.insert: insert into member(me_id, me_pw, me_email, me_phone, me_address, me_name, me_birth) values(#{member.me_id}, #{member.me_pw}, #{member.me_email}, #{member.me_phone}, #{member.me_address},#{member.me_name}, #{member.me_birth})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where me_id!=#{id} and me_name=#{name}
